alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Jefferson, northeastern Leon, southern Grady and southwestern Thomas Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 343 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Monticello, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Cairo, Ochlocknee, Fincher, Grady Co A/p, Moncrief, Festus, Rocky Hill, Miccosukee, Iamonia, Calvary, Reno, Princes Still, Jarrott, Pine Park, Beachton, Metcalf and Dawesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
